charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1)- CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE/Possession with Intent to Distribute a Controlled Substance and 18:2 Aiding and Abetting(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 1 DAY. 4 years supervised release with standard and special conditions as stated on the record. No fine. SPA $100.

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c)-VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/MACHINE GUN/Possession of a Firearm in Furtherance of a Drug Trafficking Crime(3)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 MONTHS to be served consecutively with the sentence imposed for count 2. 4 years supervised release with standard and special conditions as stated on the record. No fine. SPA $100. Forfeiture of .22 caliber Rigarmi-Brescin handgun.
